titles.title: A resolution celebrating the bicentennial of the City of Columbus, the capital city of the State of Ohio.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary: 2/14/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Celebrates the bicentennial of the founding of the City of Columbus, Ohio. Honors the contributions of the people of Columbus to this nation over the past 200 years.
